title: Vegan Caesar dressing

ingredients.content: 100 g canned chickpeas, rinsed and drained
15 g pickled capers, rinsed and drained

preparations.content: Place all ingredients into mixing bowl and blend <b>1 min/speed 10<b> or until smooth and creamy. Serve as desired or transfer into a sealable container and place into refrigerator until ready to use (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: You can store this dressing in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
We use this dressing in our Kale, sprouts and red cabbage salad (please refer to the recipe on this recipe chip). It's also delicious drizzled over salads and steamed or roasted vegetables.
